song.englishname: Put Your Lips To the TV

english.segment1: You want my head in a basket. (cause) This town ain't big enough for. The two of us are disaster. I'm not your "stepchild" anymore
english.segment2: You can kiss me goodbye. Just put your lips to the TV
english.segment3: You want my head on a platter. Cause I'm no longer in your control
english.segment4: You can kiss me goodbye. Just put your lips to the TV. Cause it's the only way you will see me again.
